workingHours.title: Working Hours Management
workingHours.weeklyDescription: Set the standard weekly working hours. These hours will be used unless overridden by a special date.

specialDate.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Closed for holiday, Extended hours for event
specialDate.activeDescription: If inactive, this special date (and its hours/adjustments) will not apply.
specialDate.statusUpdateError: Failed to update special date status.

errors.nameRequired: Name must be at least 2 characters.
errors.endTimeRequiredIfStart: End time is required if start time is set.
errors.endTimeAfterStart: End time must be after start time.
errors.startTimeRequiredIfEnd: Start time is required if end time is set.

specialDate.sectionDescription: Manage specific dates with custom hours or closures, like holidays or special events. These override weekly hours.
specialDate.calendarDescription: Select a date on the calendar to see events for that day, or view all events below.
specialDate.noEventsForSelection: No special events found for the selected date.
specialDate.noEventsInList: No special dates have been added yet.
specialDate.defaultHoursIndicator: Hours are inherited from the standard weekly schedule for this day.
specialDate.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this special date?
specialDate.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the special date.

priceAdjustment.title: Price Adjustment
priceAdjustment.tooltipInfo: Apply a price modification for services during these specific hours/dates. This only applies if the day/date is active and a value greater than 0 is set.
priceAdjustment.weeklyTooltipInfo: Set specific price adjustments for this day of the week. This will only apply if the day is marked as active and has a value greater than 0.
priceAdjustment.reasonPlaceholder: e.g., Holiday Surcharge, Happy Hour Discount

errors.valueNegative: Adjustment value cannot be negative if it's a surcharge (positive value for surcharge, negative for discount if applicable).
